translations: 警戒哨；纠察队；[建]尖木桩
派……担任纠察；用尖桩围住

sentences.sentence: I was on picket duty at the time.
sentences.translation: 当时我正执行罢工的纠察任务。

sentences.sentence: No one tried to cross the picket lines.
sentences.translation: 没有人试图越过纠察线。

sentences.sentence: Fire crews refused to cross the picket line.
sentences.translation: 消防人员拒不冲破围厂队伍人墙。
